markdownRemark.html:
This post is part of an ongoing series in which I document my journey through the COVID-19 quarantine. See Day 1 for full context.

Quick update

Had a lot of fun drawing diagrams for my next blog post. I recently discovered Excalidraw which makes it a lot easier to draw decent looking diagrams.

Also had a financial planning call with my parents and our financial advisor. So excited for the future!
